ENDPGM

# ------------------------------------------------------------------ # @1 # ------------------------------------------------------------------
DATABASE dummy
define wtime datetime year to second
MAIN
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "Start - : ",wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
LET ls_sql =" Select numinvoice from invoices " PREPARE psel_invoices FROM ls_sql DECLARE qsel_concprefact cursor with hold for psel_invoices
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "End - ", wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
END MAIN
#{msg.tituloBrowser}

3600 DEFINE SUBROUTINE CARGAR-ANO-TABLA 3650 DECIDE FOR FIRST CONDITION 3660 WHEN TAR(WI) EQ 625 3670 MOVE 2002 TO WANO-AUX 3680 FOR I=1 TO 20 3690 MOVE WANO-AUX TO ANO-625(I) 3700 ADD 1 TO WANO-AUX 3710 IF AÑO-625(I) EQ WANO 3720 ESCAPE BOTTOM 3730 END-IF 3740 END-FOR 3750 WHEN TAR(WI) EQ 651 3760 MOVE 2002 TO WANO-AUX 3770 FOR I=1 TO 20 3780 MOVE WANO-AUX TO ANO-651(I) 3790 ADD 1 TO WANO-AUX 3800 IF ANO-651(I) EQ WANO 3810 ESCAPE BOTTOM 3820 END-IF 3830 END-FOR 4110 WHEN NONE 4120 IGNORE 4130 END-DECIDE
4140 END-SUBROUTINE 4150 ************************************************************************ 4160 END /* ------------- FIN DEL PROGRAMA ------------------------- 4170 ************************************************************************

class Twig_Tests_Node_BlockReferenceTest extends Twig_Test_NodeTestCase
{
    /**
     * @covers Twig_Node_BlockReference::__construct
     */
    public function testConstructor()
    {
        $node = new Twig_Node_BlockReference('foo', 1);

        $this->assertEquals('foo', $node->getAttribute('name'));
    }

    /**
     * @covers Twig_Node_BlockReference::compile
     * @dataProvider getTests
     */
    public function testCompile($node, $source, $environment = null)
    {
        parent::testCompile($node, $source, $environment);
    }

    public function getTests()
    {
        return array(
            array(new Twig_Node_BlockReference('foo', 1), <<<EOF
// line 1
\$this->displayBlock('foo', \$context, \$blocks);
EOF
            ),
        );
    }
}

SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PR_SIMSG_COTA_ENVIO_MENSAGEM_ROBO] AS BEGIN
DECLARE @V_DATE AS DATETIME
SET @V_DATE = GETDATE()
SELECT SISORI.CD_SISTEMA AS 'ORIGEM', EXPO.CD_CARTEIRA, SISDEST.CD_SISTEMA AS 'DESTINO', EXPO.CD_INDEXADOR, CART.IC_NOVA, EXPO.VL_COTA_ATUAL, EXPO.VL_COTA_NOVA, CART.CD_USUARIO FROM TBPL_MSG_COTA_EXPORTACAO EXPO WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TBPL_MSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA CART WITH(NOLOCK) ON EXPO.ID_PARAMETRO = CART.ID_PARAMETRO INNER JOIN TBPL_MSG_COTA_SISTEMA SISORI WITH(NOLOCK) ON EXPO.ID_SISTEMA_ORIGEM = SISORI.ID_SISTEMA INNER JOIN TBPL_MSG_COTA_SISTEMA SISDEST WITH(NOLOCK) ON EXPO.ID_SISTEMA_ORIGEM = SISDEST.ID_SISTEMA LEFT JOIN TBPL_MSG_COTA_ENVIO_MENSAGEM MEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON MEN.ID_EXPORTACAO = EXPO.ID_EXPORTACAO AND MEN.ID_CADASTRO = CART.ID_CADASTRO WHERE MEN.ID_EXPORTACAO IS NULL AND MEN.ID_CADASTRO IS NULL AND EXPO.DT_ALTERACAO >= CART.DT_INCLUSAO AND EXPO.DT_ALTERACAO <= @V_DATE AND ((CART.IC_NOVA = 1) OR (CART.IC_NOVA = 0 AND EXPO.VL_COTA_ATUAL != 0)) ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7
INSERT INTO TBPL_MSG_COTA_ENVIO_MENSAGEM SELECT EXPO.ID_EXPORTACAO, CART.ID_CADASTRO, @V_DATE FROM TBPL_MSG_COTA_EXPORTACAO EXPO WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TBPL_MSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA CART WITH(NOLOCK) ON EXPO.ID_PARAMETRO = CART.ID_PARAMETRO LEFT JOIN TBPL_MSG_COTA_ENVIO_MENSAGEM MEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON MEN.ID_EXPORTACAO = EXPO.ID_EXPORTACAO AND MEN.ID_CADASTRO = CART.ID_CADASTRO WHERE MEN.ID_EXPORTACAO IS NULL AND MEN.ID_CADASTRO IS NULL AND EXPO.DT_ALTERACAO >= CART.DT_INCLUSAO AND EXPO.DT_ALTERACAO <= @V_DATE AND ((CART.IC_NOVA = 1) OR (CART.IC_NOVA = 0 AND EXPO.VL_COTA_ATUAL != 0))
END GO

Private Sub CmdLimpiar_Click() On Error GoTo CmdLimpiarClick_Error vLimpiarPantalla Exit Sub
CmdLimpiarClick_Error: Call errvManejaErrores(Err) Resume
End Sub
Private Sub CmdSalir_Click() Unload Me End Sub
Sub vLimpiarPantalla() On Error GoTo LimpiarPantalla_Error vLimpiarFr1General Fr1Informe, sFlagsInforme Exit Sub
LimpiarPantalla_Error: Call errvManejaErrores(Err) Resume End Sub
Private Sub Fr1Informe_KeyPress(KeyAscii As Integer) On Error GoTo Fr1Informe_KeyPress_Error Call inpvMayusculasKeypress(KeyAscii) Exit Sub Fr1Informe_KeyPress_Error: Call errvManejaErrores(Err) Resume End Sub

Imports System
Namespace DesignLibrary
Public Class Browser
Dim uriHistory As New History()
Sub ErrorProne() uriHistory.AddToHistory("http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub
Sub SaferWay() Try Dim newUri As New Uri("http://www.adventure-works.com") uriHistory.AddToHistory(newUri) Catch uriException As UriFormatException End Try End Sub
End Class
End Namespace

i18n.name: Líneas en blanco
i18n.description: Número de líneas en blanco. Serán líneas en blanco aquellas que no contegan comentarios o código fuente, es decir, aquellas con caracteres no imprimibles (espacios, tabuladores, retorno de carro). No cuenta como línea en blanco aquella que contiene tan sólo el carácter de fin de fichero.

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description:
Número de líneas en blanco.
NOTA: La métrica ignora las líneas contenidas dentro de scriptlets <% ... %>, declaraciones <%! ... %> y directivas de importación <%@ page import=... %> Estas líneas se contabilizan aplicando la métrica correspondiente de la tecnología JAVA sobre los ficheros JSP.

i18n.name: Blank lines
i18n.description: Number of blank lines. Blank lines are those which have neither comments nor source code, that is, those with no printable characters (blank spaces, tabs, line feed and carriage return). Not counted as blank line that one which only contains the 'End of file' character.

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description:
Number of blank lines.
NOTE: The metric ignores lines contained on scriptlets <% ... %>, declarations <%! ... %> and import directives <%@ page import=...%> Those lines are counted with the proper metric of the JAVA technology applied over the JSP files.
